thanks.1: Be sure to spread the happiness!
thanks.3: Can you return a favour by putting up Mariah Carey - All I want for Christmas is you?
thanks.4: This was quite the request, I hope your wishlist is smaller!
thanks.5: Share the Christmas feelings, why don't you help someone else?
thanks.11: Please spare me from your Christmas dinner in return..
thanks.12: Don't thank me, thank my little tadpoles🧝
thanks.13: You can thank me by giving me some sailors as gifts💝
thanks.14: Please bring me some tasty metal, I like Dutch paneling it reminds me of chocolate🌟
thanks.15: You're welcome! Merry Christmas and a happy new year!

fishing.0: it's almost Christmas, maybe I'll be generous with the gifts this month🎁
fishing.1: since Christmas is coming up I'll be sure to spawn this time.
fishing.3: you know the definition of insanity? Oh well, you can try again if you'd like.
fishing.4: you're welcome back into my Christmas headquarters.
fishing.6: have fun in the Sea of Wonders.
fishing.7: will I turn into 🍪 this time?
fishing.8: good thing my species have a great fertility rate.
fishing.10: ok all the gifts are wrapped, you can come now.
fishing.12: been a while since I've seen you, how about you come visit again?
fishing.13: **oof** it was quite a bit of work, but you can see my Christmas tree now🎄
fishing.17: i'm in the mood for some Italian today, so please bring along Venetian crewmembers this time.
fishing.18: stop hiring Spanish sailors already, it's not the time of month for spicy food!
fishing.19: do you happen to know what gluewine goes well with your crew?
fishing.20: good news! I've been lobbying KOEI to reduce my encounter rate, and I think they may do it.
fishing.21: be warned, there are gifts everywhere. Don't trip!
fishing.22: please be considerate to spare me at Christmas, I'd like to see my familiy again.
fishing.23: why do I always have to have the humorous catch phrases? Why can't YOU say something once in a while?
fishing.24: speedrun tip for your next run, remove all your plates, guns and sails, then equip a ram and collide with me.
fishing.25: ♪all I want for Christmas is you♫
fishing.26: come back to me! This time I will definitely give you the things you want!
fishing.27: hey, this is our first holiday season together. Let's make it one to dis-member! ... I mean remember.
fishing.28: I know what gift I'm giving you this holiday season: WIND SPAWNS! Just what you always wanted, right? :D
fishing.29: maybe I should drop coal this time, you've been really bad to me all year :(
fishing.30: after your next run, want to help me attach a giant pair of reindeer antlers to Leviathan's head while he's asleep?
fishing.31: winter? No, no... A wind-storm is coming!
fishing.32: hi! I'm not a snowman, but I do like warm hugs.
fishing.33: I do hope you're ready to go sailing in a WIND-ter wonderland with me.
fishing.34: fair warning: I've got to go do some last-minute holiday shopping. Better find me fast before I leave!
fishing.35: I know gift-giving is sometimes tricky, so here's a tip: bring me a selection of your yummiest sailors. Thanks in advance!
fishing.36: you know I'm not actually a giant fish -- just a bunch of elves in a fish suit hiding from Santa Claus. Believe it... or else >.>
fishing.37: oh, are you visiting again? Great, bring some ornaments, tinsel, and your crew for light snacks. I'm decorating for the holidays! xD
fishing.38: it's holiday tradition that I must surface directly beneath anyone with mistletoe on their ship and give 'em a big hug!
fishing.39: I'm trying a new recipe for the holiday. Do you happen to know what seasoning goes well with eight tiny reindeer and a jolly old fat guy?
fishing.40: all I want for Christmas is you... in mah belleh!!
fishing.41: you know, I just had another hunter fleet over for dinner and am feeling kinda sluggish... can we maybe do this later?
fishing.42: weird, Leviathan just challenged me to a snowball fight. I wonder why... Oh, you can start running again now. Not that it'll help :)
fishing.43: I know we've had a few problems over the past year, but... 'tis the season. I love you all; hope we can keep having fun together for years to come.
fishing.44: ho-ho-ho! Merry Fishmas, and have an Azure new year! ^^

tail.4: now I know who to target next time.
tail.5: it would be highly inconvenient if my storm spawns on top of you...
tail.6: careful of your ship parts.. Never know what might happen to them..
tail.7: I won't show up next time because of you.
tail.9: may bad nanban rates be upon thy.
tail.10: guess who's not getting any rewards next time.
tail.11: here, have a random -1200 fire tick for ya!
tail.12: ♪Got a whale of a tail to smack you with♫
